issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Unable to Run in Android Using MAC

comments.body:
[~s.rajaeceaut@gmail.com] can you please add more information here? we need a test case and steps to reproduce the issue 
Thanks

Initially we have developed the application with Titanium Studio 3.2.3 with SDK 3.2.3. It was working fine. When i am upgraded the Studio to 3.4.0 for iOS 8 support and i am not able to install it on Android as its showing the error that i have already shared with you.Even now i tried to run it on Studio 3.2.3 but its not allowing me to run as it is taking to upgrade the Studio. If i try to run it on 3.1.3 SDK below 3.2.0 app is getting installed but not working with open network and getting crashed and UI also getting changed with respect to expected.
Any updates on the bug?... Pls contact me if you have any query s.rajaeceaut@gmail.com

Give me your contact no...I will call and explain you the scenario.
Thank you

[~s.rajaeceaut@gmail.com] Titanium is going to be deprecated soon so you should use Appcelerator Studio. And another good news you will get a free forever indie seat if you login before April 1st. So go ahead this below link and signup

http://www.appcelerator.com/signup/

Then if you getting stuck, you can post your question in our new community
https://community.appcelerator.com/
Thanks
